creator: MGM Wireless
descriptionHtml:
It's the key to managing your family's Spacetalk devices, and it's beautifully simple to use. Quickly see the location of the children in your life, and a history of where they've been. Share location updates with the whole family. And best of all, every piece of data is securely stored in your selected region.

The AllMyTribe app features Safe Zones with fully configurable notifications. For example, the app can notify you when your child has arrived at school - or if they haven't arrived at school by a certain time, or leave school before class is over.

Through the AllMyTribe app, you can manage and customise watch faces, view location history, change position update frequency and much more. You can also call or SMS your child on their Spacetalk watch, straight from the app.

Download it today to unlock the potential of your Spacetalk GPS smartwatch and phone, and get your family connected.

The AllMyTribe app requires an ongoing in-app subscription. Subscriptions cost $5.99 per month to connect up to 2 Spacetalk devices to your AllMyTribe user account, or $8.99 per month to connect up to 5 Spacetalk devices to your AllMyTribe user account.

Common variations: All My Tribe, Space talk
descriptionShort: The AllMyTribe smartphone app keeps everyone connected.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Stability Improvements

title: AllMyTribe

creator: MGM Wireless
descriptionHtml:
The AllMyTribe app is the key to managing your loved one’s SPACETALK devices.

With a powerful, yet easy-to-use interface, it allows you to manage the specialised features of SPACETALK’s wearable devices, keeping the whole family confidently connected. All data is securely stored in either Australia or the UK depending on your location and in keeping with SPACETALK’s “safety first” ethos.

SPACETALK Kids

You manage who can contact your child, and who they can contact, by adding safe contacts to your app.

You can also select a sequence of numbers your child’s SPACETALK calls when they press the SOS button, including emergency services at your discretion.

The app allows you to quickly view the location of your child, including a history of where they have been.

It also features Safe Zones, with fully configurable notifications. For example, the app can notify you when your child has arrived at school - or if they haven't arrived at school by a certain time.

Other features you can manage through the app include School Mode, which allows you to disable features during school hours for distraction-free learning and Reward Stars, a game that you can use to incentivise positive behaviours in your child.

You can also change the fully customisable wallpapers, create SMS templates for your children to respond with, set alarms to remind your children of appointments and activities, and much more.

SPACETALK Life

A wearable device designed for adults and care-dependants that you can use to keep your loved ones safe and closely connected.

You can request the wearer’s location through the app and in keeping with the privacy needs of the wearer, they have the opportunity to deny these requests on a case by case basis.

For safety, and in case of accidents or falls, you can initiate a Safety Callback from the app that will trigger the wearer’s SPACETALK Life to call you. You can also set permissions for other nominated contacts to use this feature as well. If you attempt to call SPACETALK Life three times in 5 minutes and it is not answered, SPACETALK Life can be set to initiate a Safety Callback to you, and other people that you have allowed to use this feature. Safety Callback opens a hands-free secure listening channel so you can check the well-being of your care-dependant.

The SOS button on SPACETALK Life can be independently configured to call a list of nominated contacts, setting up a sequence of numbers to automatically dial in case of emergencies.

You can schedule reminders for appointments, medications, social events, and family gatherings directly through the app.

You can also edit SMS templates, setup Safe Zones with fully configurable notifications, view a graphical representation of the steps taken by the SPACETALK wearer, and can quickly and securely pair your device to the app using a QR code.

SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS

Download it today to unlock the potential of your family member’s SPACETALK all-in-one GPS, smartwatch and phone devices, and get your family connected.

The AllMyTribe app requires an ongoing in-app monthly subscription. For SPACETALK Kids devices subscriptions for up to 2 devices AUD$5.99 and up to 5 devices AUD$8.99. SPACETALK Life subscriptions start from AUD$9.99 per connected device.

Payment will be charged to your Google Play Store account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription automatically renews each month, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of your selected subscription plan.

You can manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings (in the Google Play app on your Android device) after purchase.

Terms of use: https://www.spacetalkwatch.com/terms_of_use

Privacy policy: https://www.spacetalkwatch.com/privacy

Common variations: All My Tribe, Space talk, Life

title: AllMyTribe

creator: MGM Wireless
descriptionHtml:
Android version

Connect the Spacetalk app with Spacetalk Kids, Spacetalk Adventurer and Spacetalk Life devices, or use it to family chat across just about any smart device. Keeping families connected is what this app was born to do.

For parents, it’s the control centre for their child’s device and keeps them updated on where their kids are. For older adults, the app provides handy fitness data, weather info and reminders (important for those on medication) straight to their Spacetalk Life. And for those with senior parents, the Spacetalk app provides location information, SOS capability and complete peace of mind when paired with their parent’s device.

For anybody who wants to create a family chat or hang out online with buddies, this is the app that’s all about connecting families and friends in a safe and secure environment.



Let’s hear it for PG tech
Manage who can contact your kids’ device and who they can contact
View their location, including a history of where they’ve been
Select a sequence of numbers your child’s SPACETALK calls when they hit SOS (including emergency services)
Set up Safe Zones to be notified when they enter or leave where they’re meant to be
Activate School Mode to disable features during school time for distraction-free learning
Come together as a huddle with the whole family – grandparents, aunts and uncles included!
Use our reward to encourage them to do chores, homework (or just behave)
Track their fitness activity, including heart rate
Customise their watch face (and choose from digital or traditional clock)
Find my Spacetalk

A big nod to seniors and independence
Drop in and request and track their location (with their approval)
Initiate a Safety Callback that triggers their device to call you, or other nominated contacts, if you’ve called them 3 times in 5 minutes with no response. You’ll be able to hear what’s going on their end (to see if they’re OK).
Select a sequence of numbers their Spacetalk calls when they hit SOS (including emergency services)
Schedule reminders for appointments, medications, social events, and family get togethers
Keep track of their fitness activity
Set up SMS templates and Safe Zones
Find my Spacetalk


The features older adults need (and none they don’t)
Fitness tracking
Weather information and forecasts
Connects with Bluetooth compatible devices
Find my Spacetalk

Huddle in
Bring the whole clan together in one spot; join in on a call, get in on a message trail or spread the love with photos, all within your private group.


Safe, secure and private
All data is securely stored locally in Australia or the UK (depending on your location)



Subscription info
The Spacetalk app requires an ongoing in-app monthly subscription (please see In-app purchases section for details).
Payment will be charged to your Google Play Store account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription automatically renews each month, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of your selected subscription plan.
You can manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings (in the Google Play app on your Android device) after purchase.

What’s New

Terms of use: https://www.spacetalkwatch.com/terms_of_use
Privacy policy: https://www.spacetalkwatch.com/privacy
descriptionShort: The Spacetalk smartphone app keeps everyone connected.

AllMyTribe is now Spacetalk, with a brand new app design.
Adds support for the new Spacetalk Adventurer watch.
Introduces Spacetalk Chat messaging for your family members. Requires Spacetalk Adventurer.

title: Spacetalk

creator: MGM Wireless
descriptionHtml:
Android version

Connect the Spacetalk app with Spacetalk Kids, Spacetalk Adventurer and Spacetalk Life devices, or use it to family chat across just about any smart device. Keeping families connected is what this app was born to do.

For parents, it’s the control centre for their child’s device and keeps them updated on where their kids are. For older adults, the app provides handy fitness data, weather info and reminders (important for those on medication) straight to their Spacetalk Life. And for those with senior parents, the Spacetalk app provides location information, SOS capability and complete peace of mind when paired with their parent’s device.

For anybody who wants to create a family chat or hang out online with buddies, this is the app that’s all about connecting families and friends in a safe and secure environment.



Let’s hear it for PG tech
Manage who can contact your kids’ device and who they can contact
View their location, including a history of where they’ve been
Select a sequence of numbers your child’s SPACETALK calls when they hit SOS (including emergency services)
Set up Safe Zones to be notified when they enter or leave where they’re meant to be
Activate School Mode to disable features during school time for distraction-free learning
Come together as a huddle with the whole family – grandparents, aunts and uncles included!
Use our reward to encourage them to do chores, homework (or just behave)
Track their fitness activity, including heart rate
Customise their watch face (and choose from digital or traditional clock)
Find my Spacetalk

A big nod to seniors and independence
Drop in and request and track their location (with their approval)
Initiate a Safety Callback that triggers their device to call you, or other nominated contacts, if you’ve called them 3 times in 5 minutes with no response. You’ll be able to hear what’s going on their end (to see if they’re OK).
Select a sequence of numbers their Spacetalk calls when they hit SOS (including emergency services)
Schedule reminders for appointments, medications, social events, and family get togethers
Keep track of their fitness activity
Set up SMS templates and Safe Zones


The features older adults need (and none they don’t)
Fitness tracking
Weather information and forecasts
Connects with Bluetooth compatible devices

Huddle in
Bring the whole clan together in one spot; join in on a call, get in on a message trail or spread the love with photos, all within your private group.


Safe, secure and private
All data is securely stored locally in Australia or the UK (depending on your location)

title: Spacetalk

creator: MGM Wireless
descriptionHtml:
Keeping families connected is what this app was born to do!

Connect the Spacetalk app with Spacetalk Kids, Spacetalk Adventurer and Spacetalk Life watches, and use it to keep your loved one’s safe while being connected to you.

For parents, it’s the control centre for their child’s watch, keeping them free from online harm, while allowing you to be in control of who contacts them, who they can contact, SOS emergency contacts and a host of other parent and kid-friendly features.

For seniors, the app provides handy fitness data, weather info and reminders (important for those on medication) on their Spacetalk Life. For those with senior parents, the Spacetalk app provides location information, SOS capability and complete peace of mind when paired with their parent’s device.

For anybody who wants to create a family chat or keep the convo going after school with buddies, the app is all about connecting families and friends in a safe and secure environment.

Let’s hear it for smart family tech!
- Manage who can contact your kids’ device and who they can contact
- SOS Alerts, in case of an emergency
- Monitor your child’s physical and emotional wellbeing with our new Feelings feature*
- HD Video Calling with parent approved contacts*
- Laugh out loud with Funny Sounds*
- View your child’s fitness activity, including heart rate^
- View their location, including a history of where they’ve been
- Set up Safe Zones to be notified when they enter or leave where they’re meant to be
- Activate School Mode to disable features during school time for distraction-free learning
- Connect with family and friends on Chat – grandparents, aunts and uncles included
- Use our Awards to encourage positive behaviours e.g. chores, homework

A big nod to seniors and independence!
- Request and track their location (with their approval)
- Initiate a Safety Callback that triggers their device to call you, to see if they’re OK
- SOS Alerts, in case of an emergency
- Schedule reminders for appointments, medications, social events, and family get-togethers
- Keep track of their fitness activity
- Set up Safe Zones to be notified when they enter or leave where they’re meant to be

Safe, secure, and private: all data is encrypted and securely stored in Australia, UK, or USA (depending on your location), on enterprise-grade servers.

Download the app today to unlock the potential of your family member’s Spacetalk all-in-one GPS, smartwatch, and phone devices, and get your family connected.

(*New features available on Spacetalk Adventurer from software build 20220927 and above. Progressively rolling out to an Adventurer near you. ^Valid for watches with a Heart Rate sensor. Spacetalk is a consumer grade general wellness device, not a certified medical device. Spacetalk wellness features are not intended for medical diagnostics. The information provided in this website or the Spacetalk mobile application is not a substitute for obtaining proper professional care or services. You should seek independent advice from a medical professional as required.)

SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS
An on-going in-app subscription may be required for the Spacetalk app.
Spacetalk Kids monthly subscription: AUD$5.99 (up to 2 devices) or AUD$8.99 (up to 5 devices)
Spacetalk Life monthly subscription: AUD$7.99 per connected device

Payment will be charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription automatically renews each month unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of your selected subscription.
You can manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Google Play Account Settings after purchase.

Terms of use: https://www.spacetalkwatch.com/terms_of_use
Privacy policy: https://www.spacetalkwatch.com/privacy
Common variations: All My Tribe, Space talk, Life

title: Spacetalk

creator: Spacetalk Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
The Spacetalk App connects to kids and seniors Spacetalk devices, enabling you to locate family members, communicate with them at any time, and manage settings that help protect them. The App connects to multiple devices, centralising your ability to keep track of your household.

For parents of children with Adventurer or Adventurer 2 devices, the Spacetalk App enables:
- High fidelity video calls - utilising a 5MP camera and a 4G LTE network.
- GPS location tracking – visualised on an interactive map, with location history.
- Talk, text & chat – using a speedy 4G LTE network.
- SOS emergency alerts – be alerted with a call, an SMS and a location update from the app when your child activates the SOS function.
- Create safe contacts – kids only communicate with parent approved phone numbers.
- School mode – parents set up school schedules to keep kids focussed in class.
- Safe zones – parents can create safe zones around known locations and be notified when their child wanders from them.
- Feelings notifications – parents can check in with quick feelings requests.
- Activity monitoring* – parents can see their child’s fitness activity, including heart rate.

For parents of children with the Kids Smartwatch, the Spacetalk App enables:
- GPS location tracking – visualised on an interactive map, with location history.
- Talk, text & Chat
- SOS emergency alerts – be alerted with a call, an SMS and a location update from the app when your child activates the SOS function.
- Create safe contacts – kids only communicate with parent approved phone numbers.
- School mode – parents set up school schedules to keep kids focussed in class.
- Safe zones – parents can create safe zones around known locations and be notified when their child wanders from them.

For people with seniors in their care, the Spacetalk App enables:
- GPS location tracking – visualised on an interactive map, with location history.
- Initiate a Safety Callback that triggers their device to call you, to see if they’re OK.
- SOS Alerts to defined emergency contacts in case of an emergency
- Schedule reminders for appointments, medications, social events, or anything else.
- Keep track of their fitness activity*.

title:

5.6.23

creator: Spacetalk Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Spacetalk Family Safety App

Spacetalk is launching the biggest upgrade yet to its Family Safety App, now available in 178 countries. This app is free and allows you to easily locate, connect, and protect your loved ones, from kids and teens to parents and seniors, ensuring their independence and your peace of mind.

Enjoy unlimited place alerts, 30-day location history, all ad-free. Unlock even more features when paired with a Spacetalk smartwatch, supporting physical and emotional health of your family. Rest assured, your data is secure.

This update brings a sleek new design for effortless navigation, improved route history, locate loved ones based on their last known location, and a dynamic health and fitness dashboard to monitor daily activity.

Key Features of the Spacetalk Family Safety App:

- Free to use, with no ads

- One app for the whole family and approved contacts

- Instant SOS alerts for emergency situations

- Real-time location, even if the battery is low

- Create and receive alerts for Safe Zones, virtual boundaries around locations

- Navigate to loved ones for easy access

- Improved route history and 30-day location history

- Built-in secure encrypted chat for safe communication

- Timed alarms for distress situations

- Emergency contacts integration


Works With or Without Smartwatches

No Smartwatch? No Problem! You can use the Spacetalk app's best features without a smartwatch. However, pairing it with one of Australia’s #1 kids' smartwatches unlocks additional benefits:

- Call, SMS, and video call kids on their smartwatch (video calls available on Spacetalk Adventurer 2)

- Access location awareness, route history, and Safe Zone alerts for your kids

- New health and fitness dashboard to monitor your kids activity

- No social media or web browser on the smartwatch, offering a safer alternative to a smartphone


Works with Senior Smartwatches Too

Even without a Spacetalk smartwatch, you can enjoy many of the app's features. For seniors with a Spacetalk Life mPERS smartwatch, the app provides even more benefits:

- GPS location sharing, 4G phone calls, and SMS without a smartphone

- SOS alerts and fall detection

- Set reminders for important tasks, like taking medicine

- Fitness to monitor exercise levels

Spacetalk is also a registered National Disability Insurance Scheme (NDIS) provider

Note: Spacetalk is a general wellness device, not a certified medical device. Its features are not intended for medical diagnostics, and you should consult a medical professional for medical advice.


About Spacetalk

Spacetalk Limited (ASX: SPA) develops hardware and software to provide safety at every stage of life. Spacetalk offers families a suite of solutions: the Spacetalk App, Australia’s best-selling kids’ smartwatches, Spacetalk Mobile, and adult smartwatches. The Spacetalk ecosystem empowers families with freedom, supported by peace of mind.

*Source: GFK Report July 2024: Total Sales of Kids Smartwatch in Australia

^Free refers to removing the 7.99AUD/mth fee

Common variations: All My Tribe, Space talk, Adventurer, Life
